name: Silver Legacy Vista Room – 1 King
description: The Silver Legacy Vista Room with 1 King bed offers modern amenities, spacious comfort, and breathtaking views from Silver Legacy's tower above downtown Reno. Enjoy stylish contemporary décor and easy access to the casino, dining, and entertainment — all just minutes from Reno's top golf courses.
shortDescription: Silver Legacy Vista Room with King bed and panoramic views of downtown Reno and the Sierra Nevada.

faqs.question: What views does the Vista Room have?
faqs.answer: Panoramic views of downtown Reno and the Sierra Nevada from Silver Legacy's tower position.

faqs.question: How far is Silver Legacy from golf courses?
faqs.answer: Lakeridge, Wolf Run, and ArrowCreek are all within 15–25 minutes. GTHS handles all transport.

testimonials.quote: Vista Room at Silver Legacy had incredible views. Woke up to the Sierra Nevada framed in the window before heading to the course.
testimonials.author: Chris M.

testimonials.quote: Good standard room with exceptional views. Modern décor, comfortable king bed, and perfect downtown location.
testimonials.author: Frank L.
